name: Summer Frozen Stick
description:
This is one of the best girls games for cooking and decorating fans.

Become a crazy chef to try new combinations of your favorite frozen ice cream dessert.

Tons of ingredients, flavors and toppings to choose from.
√ A huge variety of kitchen equipment to fulfill your cooking passion.
√ Scoop it up on a delicious waffle or a cone or a cup.
√ Colorful frosting for the dessert fans.
√ Dress up your sweet treat with yummy diffusion of sprinkle, candies, jellies, nuts and fruits.
√ Smooth game play and attractive animations.

Your dreamworld fantasy is going to be a reality now! You would love every bit of it. Socialize with your friends and tell them about this amazing crazy ice cream maker kitchen van game.
